main.name: Aidar Aukenov
main.description: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
main.bio: Software Developer with a strong knowledge of modern web technologies. Looking to be part of a team that is passionate about solving interesting problems. My strengths are JS (ES5 and higher) and JS technologies (React, Node). After 4 years of administrative positions in 2020 I decided to change my career towards software development. During that time, I was able to develop a strong foundation on how to work efficiently solo and most importantly as a team. Always interested in expanding my horizons, new challenges, and getting my hands dirty with different technology stacks.

education.description: What I learned: HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript, SASS, Bootstrap, Advanced JS Concepts, OOP, FP, React, Redux, Hooks, Node, Express, Next, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Firebase, Git
Favourite courses: Leadership and Teamwork, Organizational Beahavior, Change Management, Corporate Finance

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Advectus Solutions is a software company that delivers a fully integrated cloud-based dealer management system to various companies.

testimonials.text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
